subject: Voltas & Voltas Beko Bose || Bose || Samsung CE

custom_fields.cf_s:
Voltas & Voltas Beko

- No Cost EMI, Low Cost EMI
- IDFC Bank ,HDFC Bank, HSBC Bank, Federal Bank, BOB Financial, DBS Bank, Yes Bank
- 17.50% Cashback upto Rs.8000/-
- 3, 6, 9, 12
- 1st August - 31st August

Bose

- No Cost EMI, Low Cost EMI
- HDFC Bank, Amex, Federal Bank, IDFC First Bank, DBS Bank
- Maximum Cashback upto Rs.5000/-
- 1st August - 31st August
- 3, 6, 9, 12

Samsung CE

- Same as Old Creatives
- Low Cost EMI
- HDFC, SBI , Axis , Amex, BOB , IDFC , AU SFB , Federal , DBS 
- max 22.5% CB up to 25,000
- 1st to 31st August
- 3/6/9/12m

Samsung Mobiles 

- KV Same as Old Creatives
- Cashback up to Rs 20K 
- HDFC , Axis , SBI , Amex , IDFC , FEDERAL , Yes , BOB , CANARA
- 1st to 31st Aug'25
- 3/6/9/12m

conversations.body_text:
Hi team

Kindly help with the creatives for the following brands

*1. Voltas & Voltas Beko*

- KV - Same as Old Creatives
- No Cost EMI, Low Cost EMI
- IDFC Bank ,HDFC Bank, HSBC Bank, Federal Bank, BOB Financial, DBS Bank,
Yes Bank
- 17.50% Cashback upto Rs.8000/-
- 3, 6, 9, 12
- 1st August - 31st August

*2. Bose*

- KV - Same as Old Creatives
- No Cost EMI, Low Cost EMI
- HDFC Bank, Amex, Federal Bank, IDFC First Bank, DBS Bank
- Maximum Cashback upto Rs.5000/-
- 1st August - 31st August
- 3, 6, 9, 12

*3. Samsung CE*

- KV - Same as Old Creatives
- Low Cost EMI
- HDFC, SBI , Axis , Amex, BOB , IDFC , AU SFB , Federal , DBS
- max 22.5% CB up to 25,000
- 1st to 31st August
- 3/6/9/12m




*May 2025 surround you with kindness, laughter, and everything that makes
you smile! ?*

*Vanshika Khurana*

Hi team 

Kindly help with the creatives for the following brands 

1. Voltas & Voltas Beko

- KV - Same as Old Creatives
- No Cost EMI, Low Cost EMI
- IDFC Bank ,HDFC Bank, HSBC Bank, Federal Bank, BOB Financial, DBS Bank, Yes Bank
- 17.50% Cashback upto Rs.8000/-
- 3, 6, 9, 12
- 1st August - 31st August

2. Bose

- KV - Same as Old Creatives
- No Cost EMI, Low Cost EMI
- HDFC Bank, Amex, Federal Bank, IDFC First Bank, DBS Bank
- Maximum Cashback upto Rs.5000/-
- 1st August - 31st August
- 3, 6, 9, 12

3. Samsung CE

- KV - Same as Old Creatives
- Low Cost EMI
- HDFC, SBI , Axis , Amex, BOB , IDFC , AU SFB , Federal , DBS
- max 22.5% CB up to 25,000
- 1st to 31st August
- 3/6/9/12m




May 2025 surround you with kindness, laughter, and everything that makes you smile! 🌻

Vanshika Khurana

conversations.body_text:
Hi Narendra,

For Samsung 20,000 cashback creative : Add a tab visual as well, attached a
few images for your reference, you can pickup from the Samsung website
<https://www.samsung.com/in/tablets/all-tablets/>as well
For Samsung 25,000 cashback creative: Remove the laptop visual and add a
microwave oven visual, attached a image for your reference or pickup from
Samsung website, Additionally add the Yes bank logo here as well.



Regards,

Harish Chaduvula,
Mail id: harish.chaduvula@paytm.com
Mobile:8331897191.
